UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: An amphipathic peptide combats multidrug-resistant Staphylococcus aureus and biofilms.
Literature.Author: Zhang K, Yang N, Mao R, Zhao Y, Teng D, Wang J

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:1% Hemolysis=256 µg/ml,Bovine endometrial epithelial cells BNCC 359233:15% Cytotoxicity=256 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MBC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MBC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MBC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus E48(MBC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus E48(MBC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus CVCC 546(MBC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus CVCC 546(MBC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MBC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MBC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 35984(MBC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 35984(MBC=8µg/ml),Streptococcus agalactiae ATCC 13813(MBC=2µg/ml),Streptococcus dysgalactiae CVCC 3938(MBC=4µg/ml),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(20-30% Cytotoxicity=256µg/ml)
